title: An Act relative to the Massachusetts Poland Trade Commission

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Oliveira, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 2196) of Jacob R. Oliveira for legislation relative to the Massachusetts Poland Trade Commission.  State Administration and Regulatory Oversight.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on State Administration and Regulatory Oversight
